title: Card Case
medium:
Medium: silk, sequins
Technique: Painted and embroidered white silk plain weave with attached gilt foil-wrapped silk and gilt spangles. Decorated as a single panel, folded.
description: White silk moire card case painted on one side with a maypole beside a small building, and on the other with a quiver of arrows.

tombstone.epitaph:
Card Case.
Medium: silk, sequins
Technique: Painted and embroidered white silk plain weave with attached gilt foil-wrapped silk and gilt spangles. Decorated as a single panel, folded.. Bequest of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-6-16.
